info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 10:31PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Mecklenburg and southwestern Union Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Indian Land, or near Weddington, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Indian Trail, Weddington, Stallings, Wesley Chapel, Waxhaw, Lake Park, Mineral Springs, Marvin and South Charlotte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
